message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd really appreciate. I'm offering it to you for $180.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something a bit closer to $160. Would that work for you?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140.
